name: Vector Store Question Answer Tool
semantic_context: Answer questions with a vector store
natural_language_description: 这是 Vector Store Question Answer Tool 节点。主要用于: Answer questions with a vector store

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the data in vector store. This will be used to fill this tool description: Useful for when you need to answer questions about [name]. Whenever you need information about [data description], you should ALWAYS use this. Input should be a fully formed question.
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Name | 作用: Name of the data in vector store. This will be used to fill this tool description: Useful for when you need to answer questions about [name]. Whenever you need information about [data description], you should ALWAYS use this. Input should be a fully formed question.

description.name: description
description.description: Describe the data in vector store. This will be used to fill this tool description: Useful for when you need to answer questions about [name]. Whenever you need information about [data description], you should ALWAYS use this. Input should be a fully formed question.
description.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description of Data | 作用: Describe the data in vector store. This will be used to fill this tool description: Useful for when you need to answer questions about [name]. Whenever you need information about [data description], you should ALWAYS use this. Input should be a fully formed question.

topK.name: topK
topK.description: The maximum number of results to return
topK.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: The maximum number of results to return | 默认值: 4
